  • php知识笔记

    写入文件

    $fp = fopen($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']."/xxx.txt","a+");
fwrite($fp,date("Y-m-d H:i:s",time())."\r\n");
fclose($fp);

    查找文件下所有文件名

    $str = '';
$dir = "../Tpl/";
$preg2 = '/[A-Za-z]/';
if (is_dir ( $dir )) {
    if ($dh = opendir ( $dir )) {
        while ( ($file = readdir ( $dh )) !== false ) {
            if (preg_match ( $preg2, $file )) {
                $zt = '';
                if ($info ['theme'] == $file) {
                    $zt = 'selected';
                }
                $str .= '<option value=' . $file . ' ' . $zt . '>' . $file . '</option>';
            }
        }
        closedir ( $dh );
    }
}

    1000-01-01
